entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
